task.prompt: Implement BB #43: Port dispatch/watchdog to Go state-machine supervision. Port Ralph loop orchestration, watchdog health/staleness detection to explicit state transitions. Replace fragile process handling with tracked metadata. Emit structured events (started, heartbeat, blocked, complete, stale, error). Add state-machine tests for transitions. Acceptance: dispatch + watchdog run from bb with deterministic status, regression tests for fragility cases. Issue: https://github.com/misty-step/bitterblossom/issues/43
